title: Cairns Schema - Reusable Patterns
description: Contains reusable regular expression patterns for the Project Philosophy Library schema.
$comment: These patterns are referenced by other schema definition files.

docId.description: Pattern for a document ID. Allows lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and dots.

docOrPrincipleId.description: Pattern for a document ID or a principle ID within a document (docId#principleId).

ownerSlug.description: Pattern for an owner slug (team identifier, not an email). Allows lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

filePathOrAnchor.description: Pattern for a relative file path (starting with ./ or ../) or an anchor within the same document (starting with #). WARNING: Path validation is format-only; secure path handling is required by the consuming application.

sha256Hex.description: Pattern for a SHA-256 hash value (64 hexadecimal characters).

sha512Hex.description: Pattern for a SHA-512 hash value (128 hexadecimal characters).

pgpFingerprint.description: Pattern for a PGP key fingerprint (40 or 49 uppercase hex characters, possibly with spaces).

snippetPath.description: Pattern for a path to a code snippet file located in the './snippets/' directory.

principleId.description: Pattern for a principle ID within a document. Allows lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

contextType.description: Pattern for an applicability context type identifier. Allows lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

anchorRef.description: Pattern for an anchor reference within the same document (must start with #).

customRelType.description: Pattern for a custom relationship type identifier. Allows lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.
